messages.subject: conference deadline & funshops & scholarships
messages.msgSnippet: I just want to remind everyone that the Early Bird Deadline for the upcoming Live and Learn Unschooling Conference is rapidly approaching! End of this month:
messages.messageBody:
I just want to remind everyone that the Early Bird Deadline for the
upcoming Live and Learn Unschooling Conference is rapidly approaching!

End of this month: June 30, 2006
http://www.liveandlearnconference.org/registration.html

If you're looking to host a funshop, I'd like to know that before the
end of this month as well. I'd need to approve the funshop first, but
then I'll need a photo of you, a 4-5 line bio, a title & description of
your funshop.

Scholarships need to be requested before the end of this month too.

I'm expecting to be *very* busy these next 4 weeks! <g>

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://liveandlearnconference.org

"The hardest problem for the brain is not learning, but forgetting. No
matter how hard we try, we can't deliberately forget something we have
learned, and that is catastrophic if we learn that we can't learn."
~Frank Smith
